Dialogue: words words words. also fart noises
Ah, fellow mercs. Nothing personal, just business. You understand.
BribeSuccessDialogue: On second thought, your money spends just as good as theirs. Initiating evac.
BribeFailureDialogue: A contract is a contract, and we don't break ours.

Dialogue: Oh good, it's {Commander.Callsign} and their band of merry assholes {COMPANY.CompanyName}. We lost some good people and a better payday on {RCNT_SYSTEM} thanks to you. Time for some revenge.
BribeSuccessDialogue: You're an asshole, but I'd rather have money than revenge. For now.
You're an asshole, but I'd rather have money than revenge. For now.
